predicate.note: Frames file for 'fear' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet classes 31.2 31.3, other framed members include despise, dislike, enjoy, favor, resent, react, wallow. Comparison with despise.

example.name: transitive
example.text: They are also indirectly subject to approval by the state of New Hampshire, where residents fear soaring rates to pay for the cost of reorganization.
example.arg: soaring rates to pay for the cost of reorganization
